content: The top five industry in the world together consumed over two thirds of all industrial energy in 2005 [gea]. Cement is a subset of non-metallic minerals, while aluminum is one of the non-ferrous metals.
sections.name: The Big Players

references.journal: Cambridge University Press, Cambridge, UK and New York, NY, USA and the International Institute for Applied Systems Analysis, Laxenburg, Austria.
references.author: GEA, 2012
references.title: Global Energy Assessment - Toward a Sustainable Future
